mutants.code:
def format_sensor_readings(UV_index, visible_light, infrared, temperature, humidity):
    """
    Formats the sensor readings into a string.

    Args:
        UV_index (float): The UV index reading.
        visible_light (int): The visible light reading.
        infrared (int): The infrared light reading.
        temperature (float): The temperature reading.
        humidity (float): The humidity reading.

    Returns:
        str: A formatted string containing the sensor readings.
    """
    return f'{UV_index:.2f}\nVisible:{visible_light}\nIR:{infrared}\n======== bme280 ========\ntemperature:{temperature:.2f}\nhumidity:{humidity:.0f}'

def format_sensor_readings(UV_index, visible_light, infrared, temperature, humidity):
    """
    Formats the sensor readings into a string.

    Args:
        UV_index (float): The UV index reading.
        visible_light (int): The visible light reading.
        infrared (int): The infrared light reading.
        temperature (float): The temperature reading.
        humidity (float): The humidity reading.

    Returns:
        str: A formatted string containing the sensor readings.
    """
    return f'UV_index:{UV_index:.2f}{visible_light}\nIR:{infrared}\n======== bme280 ========\ntemperature:{temperature:.2f}\nhumidity:{humidity:.0f}'

def format_sensor_readings(UV_index, visible_light, infrared, temperature, humidity):
    """
    Formats the sensor readings into a string.

    Args:
        UV_index (float): The UV index reading.
        visible_light (int): The visible light reading.
        infrared (int): The infrared light reading.
        temperature (float): The temperature reading.
        humidity (float): The humidity reading.

    Returns:
        str: A formatted string containing the sensor readings.
    """
    return f'UV_index:{UV_index:.2f}\nVisible:{visible_light}{infrared}\n======== bme280 ========\ntemperature:{temperature:.2f}\nhumidity:{humidity:.0f}'

def format_sensor_readings(UV_index, visible_light, infrared, temperature, humidity):
    """
    Formats the sensor readings into a string.

    Args:
        UV_index (float): The UV index reading.
        visible_light (int): The visible light reading.
        infrared (int): The infrared light reading.
        temperature (float): The temperature reading.
        humidity (float): The humidity reading.

    Returns:
        str: A formatted string containing the sensor readings.
